ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and coarsely shredded, 3  Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 cup golden raisins, 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed, 1  egg,   +   1/4 cup milk
nutrition: Total Fat 17g 21%, Saturated Fat 4g 22%, Cholesterol 32mg 11%, Sodium 130mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 88g 32%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 62g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 6mg 28%, Calcium 70mg 5%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 406mg 9%
